abstractText: The Editor-in-Chief and the publisher have retracted this article. The article was submitted to be part of a guest-edited issue. An investigation by the publisher found a number of articles, including this one, with a number of concerns, including but not limited to compromised editorial handling and peer review process, inappropriate or irrelevant references or not being in scope of the journal or guest-edited issue. Based on the investigation’s findings, the Editor-in-Chief therefore no longer has confidence in the results and conclusions of this article. Yuhao Zhao has not responded to correspondence regarding this retraction.

sections.heading: Retraction Note: Research on personal
sections.text:
credit evaluation of internet finance based on blockchain and decision tree algorithm Yuhao Zhao*
Retraction Note: EURASIP Journal on Wireless Communications and Networking (2020) 2020:213 https:// doi. org/ 10. 1186/ s13638- 020- 01819-w
The Editor-in-Chief and the publisher have retracted this article. The article was submitted to be part of a guest-edited issue. An investigation by the publisher found a number of articles, including this one, with a number of concerns, including but not limited to compromised editorial handling and peer review process, inappropriate or irrelevant references or not being in scope of the journal or guest-edited issue. Based on the investigation’s findings, the Editor-in-Chief therefore no longer has confidence in the results and conclusions of this article.
Yuhao Zhao has not responded to correspondence regarding this retraction.

title: Retraction Note: Research on personal credit evaluation of internet finance based on blockchain and decision tree algorithm
